Can you please never release an album on iTunes...
...that automatically downloads to people's playlists ever again?
I had this beautiful idea but I got carried away with ourselves.
Artists are prone to that kind of thing,...
...drop of megalomania and touch of generosity.
Dash of self-promotion and deep fear...
...that these songs that we poured our life into over the last few years might not be heard.
It's a lot of noise out there.
I guess we got a little noisy ourselves to get through it.
